inputSpec.name: DX_PROJECT
inputSpec.label: DNAnexus project id
inputSpec.help:
Project in which to run and store analysis outputs. 
 If not given a new one will be created from the run ID and assay code.

inputSpec.name: SENTINEL_FILE
inputSpec.label: Sentinel file
inputSpec.help: Sentinel file for run to analyse, uploaded by dx-streaming-upload

inputSpec.name: SAMPLE_SHEET_ID
inputSpec.label: SampleSheet
inputSpec.help: Samplesheet for given run, if not given will attempt to find in data tars. Must be given if using fastqs input.

inputSpec.name: SAMPLE_NAMES
inputSpec.label: sample names
inputSpec.help: Comma separated list of sample names for given fastqs, only required if running without samplesheet

inputSpec.name: FASTQS
inputSpec.label: fastqs
inputSpec.help: Set of fastqs to use for starting analysis on if already demultiplexed

inputSpec.name: HIGH_LEVEL_CONFIG
inputSpec.label: high level config
inputSpec.help: High level config file of sample naming -> assay types. Use specified high level config file. Default is to retrieve from $HIGH_LEVEL_CONFIG_PATH

inputSpec.name: CUSTOM_CONFIG
inputSpec.label: low level config
inputSpec.help: Use given low level config for running analyses instead of inferring from name

inputSpec.name: EGGD_CONDUCTOR_CONFIG
inputSpec.label: eggd conductor config
inputSpec.help: Use specified config file for global app variables (i.e. tokens). Default is to retrieve from $EGGD_CONDUCTOR_CFG_PATH

inputSpec.name: ASSAY_TYPE
inputSpec.label: assay type
inputSpec.help: Use low level config for all samples for given assay code (e.g. TWE, WES, MYE...)

inputSpec.name: RUN_ID
inputSpec.label: ID of sequencing run
inputSpec.help: Parsed from samplesheet if not given

inputSpec.name: VALIDATE_SAMPLESHEET
inputSpec.label: validate samplesheet
inputSpec.help: Perform samplesheet validation and exit on invalid sheet

inputSpec.name: DEVELOPMENT
inputSpec.label: development
inputSpec.help: Name output project with 003 prefix and date instead of 002

inputSpec.name: BCL2FASTQ_JOB_ID
inputSpec.label: bcl2fastq job id
inputSpec.help: Optionally use fastqs from previous bcl2fastq job, will skip demultiplexing stage

inputSpec.name: BCL2FASTQ_OUT
inputSpec.label: bcl2fastq output path
inputSpec.help: Path to store bcl2fastq output, if not given will default to run dir in 001_Staging_Area52. Should be in the format project:path

inputSpec.name: EGGD_CONDUCTOR_CFG_PATH
inputSpec.label: eggd_conductor path
inputSpec.help: Override default path of where to search for latest eggd_conductor cfg file

inputSpec.name: HIGH_LEVEL_CONFIG_PATH
inputSpec.label: high level path
inputSpec.help: Override default path of where to search for latest high level config file
